Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -10,4 +10,8 @@
       - key: DJANGO_DEBUG
         value: false
       - key: ALLOWED_HOSTS
         value: .onrender.com
+build:
+  commands:
+    - pip install -r requirements.txt
+    - python manage.py collectstatic --noinput

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
services:
  - type: web
    name: portfolio-website
    env: python
    buildCommand: ./build.sh
    startCommand: gunicorn portfolio_website.wsgi:application
    envVars:
      - key: DJANGO_SECRET_KEY
        generateValue: true
      - key: DJANGO_DEBUG
        value: false
      - key: ALLOWED_HOSTS
        value: .onrender.com
